description:
NetworkManager 1.50 open-source network connection manager for Linux-based distributions is now available with various improvements and new features. Here’s what’s new!

The post NetworkManager 1.50 Adds Support for Configuring Wi-Fi Channel Width in AP Mode appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: NetworkManager 1.50 Adds Support for Configuring Wi-Fi Channel Width in AP Mode
